name: article_page
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool climate_news_feed.
Tool description: Climate Change news from the most trusted sources. Nasa, UN, and more. Flexible, reliable, and fast with low latency. Includes thumbnails, filtering, and pagination
API description: Fetches a page of articles based on the provided page ID, with an optional limit on the number of articles returned and a specified RapidAPI key.

is_id.description: The ID of the page to fetch articles from.

limit.description: The maximum number of articles to retrieve. Defaults to 10.
